name: Diory.co
tagline: The company behind the Personal Web
body:
### Welcome to Diory Ltd. :)
We aim to change how we people think about information. We are originators of the Personal Web project.

### Personal Information Revolution
```
We want that we people are in the center of our digital life.
We want that we people have our own zone in the digital world.
We want that we people have our information themselves.
```

### Personal Web project
The Personal Web project is an open source project that makes the Personal Information Revolution happen.

### Team
Our team consist of @jvalanen and @opohjola.

### Support or Contact
Want to know more? Contact us at [@jvalanen](http://twitter.com/jvalanen) and [@oopeepohjola](http://twitter.com/oopeepohjola).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
